home.title: Splashplay - Art Studio in Barcelona
home.description: An art studio in Barcelona where creativity flows freely and people try playful unconventional techniques to create your abstract masterpiece.
home.subtitle: For families, couples, groups of friends and teams

main.hero_subtitle: Art studio in Barcelona where creativity flows freely. For families, couples, groups of friends and teams. No skills needed!
main.why_fun_description: Forget about paintbrushes. In our studio you'll try fun and unconventional techniques to create your abstract masterpiece, including:

pouring.title: Pouring
pouring.description: Pour different colors and watch them mix forming hypnotic patterns.

spinning.title: Spinning
spinning.description: Create radial designs by spinning your canvas after applying paint.

boxing.title: Boxing
boxing.description: Box your way to artistic expression with paint-covered boxing gloves.

balloons.title: Balloons
balloons.description: Create playful splash patterns by popping paint-filled balloons over the canvas.

balls.title: Balls
balls.description: Create vibrant splatters by throwing paint-dipped padel balls against the canvas.

guns.title: Water Guns
guns.description: Create color explosions by shooting paint with fun water guns on the canvas.

dripping.title: Dripping
dripping.description: Create unique strokes by letting paint drip freely on the canvas, pure Pollock style.

surprise.title: Surprise
surprise.description: Discover our secret technique: a surprise experience that transforms the canvas into pure fun and color.

techniques.more: And many more! Try any of these or invent your own!

testimonials.name: Sveta
testimonials.text: A great creative space where my friends and I not only painted and had fun, but also discovered something about ourselves.
testimonials.highlight: I'll definitely come back! Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Mario
testimonials.text: We had an amazing time here! I had never painted before, but the playful and creative atmosphere was so welcoming that I created a piece that now hangs proudly in my home.

testimonials.name: Eliseo
testimonials.text: We had a very fun team afternoon, and beautiful things came out even from me, who don't have much art sense
testimonials.highlight: We had a very fun team afternoon

testimonials.name: Anastasia
testimonials.text: My friends and I created patterns and designs from our imagination. It was very fun and fascinating to discuss afterwards what each painting could symbolize.

testimonials.name: Jordi
testimonials.text: We came as a family and had a great time. They gave us aprons, shoe covers and gloves so we could paint without getting dirty. The space is very well prepared: there are protected walls, quality materials and many options to experiment with paint.
testimonials.highlight: We came as a family and had a great time

main.who_for: Who It's For and What's the Price
main.who_for_description: Our sessions are designed for anyone who wants to combine fun, creativity and connection:

friends.title: Groups of Friends
friends.description: Friends looking to have a fun time in Barcelona and a unique alternative to bowling, laser tag, karaoke or escape rooms. For a group of 2 to 6 people.

couples.title: Couples
couples.description: Couples looking for a new date idea in Barcelona, something more fun and intimate than typical "art and wine" and designed just for two.

families.title: Families
families.description: Parents with children who want to spend time together in a creative way and strengthen their bonds.

teams.title: Teams
teams.description: Coworkers looking for an unforgettable and fun team building experience.

individual.title: Individual
individual.description: A creative experience just for you

main.open_sessions_description: Want to meet new people and just try it out? Join our weekly open sessions ‚Äî fun painting events where anyone can participate.
main.gift_cards_description: Perfect gift for art lovers! Give the gift of creativity.
main.gift_cards_subtitle: The perfect gift for the creative person in your life!
main.gift_cards_validity: All certificates are valid for 12 months. The 10 canvas certificate is valid for 18 months.

steps.title: Book Your Session
steps.description: Choose the date and time that works best for you and your companions and get ready for an unforgettable creative adventure.

steps.title: Arrive and Get a Welcome Drink
steps.description: Enter our space, relax and get ready to have fun with art.

steps.title: Get Equipped
steps.description: Put on a protective suit, gloves and shoe covers so you can fully immerse yourself without worrying about the mess.

steps.title: Choose Your Colors
steps.description: Select your favorite paints and unleash your creativity. No rules, just play!

steps.title: Create and Have Fun
steps.description: Splash, pour, punch or spin to create an abstract masterpiece.

steps.title: Pick Up Your Artwork
steps.description: Your painting will be ready to pick up in 24-48 hours once it dries.

main.gallery_description: Discover the amazing artworks created by our visitors. Get inspired for your own creative session!
main.copyright: ¬© 2025 SplashPlay Creative Studio. All rights reserved.

book.event_type_friends_desc: Great for friend groups and celebrations
